title: Jayco AlUla Women’s Team Becomes Liv AlUla Jayco as Bike Brand Renews Commitment
content:
Giant Bicycles extends deal with men's and women's Jayco AlUla squads through 2027, Specialized re-ups with SD Worx through 2028.

Read the full article at Jayco AlUla Women’s Team Becomes Liv AlUla Jayco as Bike Brand Renews Commitment on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
